description: Being part of the team behind HaloGigi, a dental self screening and telemedicine platform. Developed fast and efficient backend API for the platform using laravel and MySQL, provided clean data for mobile developers, ensuring application stability and speed.

Co-founded and developed the backend for a SaaS telecomunication platform used by one of Indonesia’s major ride-hailing companies. Designed scalable microservices using Go, PostgreSQL, and Redis to handle high-traffic operations, while implementing CI/CD pipelines with Docker and Git. Led backend development and ensured secure, reliable, and high-performance systems for large-scale production use.

Introduced Docker and Docker Compose to streamline deployment processes and improved backend performance using Go—resulting in a RAM usage reduction of over 50%—while creating API connections for messaging, payment, and billing vendors. Additionally, I developed web applications for both client and admin usage and assisted in building an e-commerce dashboard using Laravel.

Developed a Laravel-based POS system for cashier dashboards and client orders, integrating Go and gRPC to ensure secure data transmission and improved transaction efficiency. Maintained server reliability and designed transmitters to streamline vendor-client connectivity, ensuring consistent application uptime.
Supported troubleshooting and optimization of internal backend code.
